item.title: Visa Unveils ‘Layer 2’ Network for Stablecoins and Central Bank Currencies
item.dc:creator: Bo
item.description: We are one step closer to succeed: Here comes the technology that will connect the ZeroDollar with today's financial system...
item.content:encoded:
Visa revealed an ambitious play to build a universal hub for stablecoins and central bank digital currencies… https://decrypt.co/82233/visa-universal-payment-channel-stablecoin-cbdc...

Source

item.title: We are getting Community support for the decentralized map tile server…
item.dc:creator: Bo
item.description: Dropped a request at the Cesium Community Forum, and Ohad offered immediately his help with creating a repository, that is the blueprint for a pipeline to produce map tiles...

item.title: The Cloud Atlas Live Demo is online…
item.dc:creator: Bo
item.description: Finally, we have a running Live Demo. There are changes published every day, so keep watching...
item.content:encoded:
https://cloud-atlas.org/ to stay up to date… (The Google login works, Facebook and Apple are disabled for now)...

Source

item.title: Start your profitable non-profit now and reach a worldwide audience for peanuts…
item.dc:creator: Bo
item.description: Looking to build a new Progressive Web App and not sure where to get started? This is what your are looking for...

item.title: Cesium just made the globe available in Unreal Engine
item.dc:creator: Bo
item.description:
That was exactly what we were waiting for...
Now we are working on both the most famous game development engines available.

item.title: The first two coders donating their time…
item.dc:creator: Bo
item.description:
Wow!
That went so much faster than I thought. I applied with the Cloud Atlas on Code for Social Good and immediately got two applicants, supporting our cause.
item.content:encoded:
That went so much faster than I thought. I applied with the Cloud Atlas on Code for Social Good and immediately got two applicants, supporting our cause.
